dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle uncertainty?

options.description: Your FarTwin will eagerly take calculated risks to achieve their goals.
Your FarTwin will carefully weigh options and avoid uncertain situations.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new knowledge?

options.description: Your FarTwin will thoroughly analyze and dissect information to understand it.
Your FarTwin will focus on applying theoretical knowledge to real-world situations.

dimensions.label: Career Ambition
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize career goals?

options.description: Your FarTwin will strive for leadership roles and significant professional achievements.
Your FarTwin will focus on stability, security, and modest career advancement.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin engage with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will freely interact and connect with people from diverse backgrounds.
Your FarTwin will prefer to maintain a comfortable distance and engage in one-on-one interactions.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin showcase their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will actively pursue artistic or creative outlets to express themselves.
Your FarTwin will prefer to channel their creativity through private, personal projects.

dimensions.label: Financial Priorities
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage finances?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize saving and investing over spending on luxuries.
Your FarTwin will freely spend money to support causes or loved ones they care about.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize time allocation?

options.description: Your FarTwin will optimize their schedule to maximize productivity and minimize downtime.
Your FarTwin will adapt to changing circumstances and prioritize flexibility over strict schedules.

dimensions.label: Analytical Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin tackle complex problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on quantitative data and statistical analysis to inform decisions.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts and rely on gut feelings when making decisions.
